content: So I bought a new-to-me car last month (yay!) but I let my emotions get the better of me and went over budget (booo) so I ended up throwing more of my discretionary savings into the car than planned. So the goal now is to replenish my house/car repair fund and travel fund to each be at least $1000. House/car repair fund Feb 1st: $0Travel fund Feb 1st: $0 House/car repair fund Feb 28th: $350Travel fund Feb 28th: $350 Thank goodness for tax refunds, guys.
